text: Nickolas Robert Diaz born August 2, 1983 is an American mixed martial artist. He competes in the middleweight division of the Ultimate Fighting Championship UFC. Former Strikeforce, WEC and IFC welterweight champion. == References == == Other websites == * Nick Diaz profile at UFC.com * * * Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:American mixed martial artists
title: Nick Diaz
